attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That the PM use his good offices to promote the nomination of Mr Martin McGuinness, MP, MLA, Deputy First Minister of Northern Ireland for the Nobel Prize for Medicine.

Thanks to Mr McGuinness and his associates, The Royal Victoria Hospital in Belfast has become a global centre of excellence, known and admired for its work of reconstructive surgery of the lower limbs, especially kneecaps.

We request that on behalf of a grateful United Kingdom and on behalf of the medical, surgical, nursing and psychiatric teams whose work he has so enriched - to say nothing of the recipients of his inventive methods - you advance Mr Martin  McGuinness’s name to the Nobel authorities as a suitable recipient of the Medicine prize; whilst he is there, of course, he could also receive the Peace prize.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
